The article was published on a fake: news site called NewsExaminer, which has been classified as such by Snopes, a reputable urban legends site.
The individuals mentioned in the article: such as the pastor Paul Horner and the judge Myron Danus, do not exist. The names have been used in past articles by fake news sites.
The LGBT Pride Center mentioned in the a: but the supposed president, Gwen Hawkins, does not exist. The actual executive director of the Pride Center of Vermont is Kim Fountain.
The Vermont Family Research Committee an: Steve Shand, could not be found in any records.
